Vue
Class Case

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Panel
              Vue.Case
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Case
extends java.awt.Panel

Class Case extends Panel permet de mettre une image de case et de mettre ou enlever une image de piece.

Author:
LeoPaul MARTIN
See Also:
Serialized Form
